game_description: You can experience the Japanese internet meme "Sashimi Tanpopo" in VR! This app allows you to work on an imaginary (and nonsense) easy job of placing a flower on sashimis. You can play one-minute "Sashimi Tanpopo" mode and eternal "Infinite Tanpopo" mode. Both touch controllers and hand-tracking are supported. Refresh rate 90Hz is also supported on Oculus Quest 2.
review_1: As you can see from the video, this is a very simple game. However, playing it with hand tracking is incredibly enjoyable. It is almost like a rhythm exercise! Just buy it. You won't regret it!
